title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments: How does one go about negotiating offers with another firm when you already have an offer in hand? What’s the range (10-50%?) increase in base pay that you can ask for? How do you bring up the joining bonus in an interview?

am I good enough to work in small digital marketing company?

Last website I made is: whitefieldexim.com, I can make these type of website in 5-7 days in WordPress... I'm good at using ps & illustrator (also made their company brochure, linked in footer).

I am hiring for three roles right now:

a) Orcale SOA Middleware developer (3+ YOE)
b) .net Developer (4+ years)
c) HR managers 

All three roles have multiple openings.

HIRING 
(Interns / Freelance / Full-time)

* UI/UX Designer (Web/Mobile App Design)
* Frontend Developer (React/Next/JS)
* Business Analyst (Agile, Scrum, Technical Writing)

All roles are immediate opening, paid, and remote!

DM me if you're interested.

Start with asking for 50% at least , they might say they may have a cap around 30% or something. It all depends on how much the industry and that company allows for that

For joining bonus straight up ask if there is a joining bonus especially if they ask you to join within a week
